(Clifton Village)

Sleeps up to 6 guests

- 2 x Double Bedrooms
- 1 x Double Sofa Bed

Hello! and welcome to our profile.

Your Apartment- Bristol, is passionate about providing unique living spaces that make guests feel more at home than at a hotel. A family run business, we have established ourselves as Bristol’s leading provider of serviced apartments.

Offering a wide selection of boutique-style serviced apartments at affordable prices. These range from studios to 3-bedrooms, with each apartment interior individually designed by our in-house creative team.

column7: Grange Rd Flat 1b one bedroom flat
column8: Brand new block of 7 apartments. This 1 bedroom flat is ideally located in Clifton, only a few minutes from Clifton village and the Clifton suspension bridge.
column9:
The neighborhood is one of the best in Bristol if you are looking for a stay in the City. With shops, restaurants and cafes on your doorstep, you will not be disappointed.
- Next to the Downs
- 5- 10 min walk from Clifton suspension Bridge
- 5-10 min walk from the Observatory
- 5 min from Clifton village
- Nutmeg
- Clifton Sausage
- Giggling Squid
column16:
Hello we are Hopewell and welcome to our profile. We are dedicated to making sure you enjoy your stay in one of our many homes, be that in the city centre, Clifton or beyond.
We are here to help you enjoy your time with us and get the best out of what Bristol has to offer. 
Our team really has great knowledge of the area so please feel free to ask us any questions.  We are all really passionate about our great city, and are excited about others coming to explore all it has to offer.
Everyone has a role to play in the team, so there is always someone to look after you.
We are experts in Airbnb which started from looking after our own properties, to friends, to the whole of Bristol and beyond. 

We look forward to having you to stay!

column8:
Now 6.26-7.2 is available for bed and whole room.

Student apartment in city centre of Bristol, 5min walk to harbourside. It’s a comfy studio, including heating, washing machine, fridge, independent bathroom and kitchen, a double-size bed. Feel free to use facilities.

When I'm traveling outside during summer, you can sleep on my bed. If I’m in Bristol, you’ll share room with me, sleep on a safa (length 1.2m, width 0.6m) extended by a suitcase, which is confirmed okay by many guests.
column16:
I’m a uni student in Bristol, making efforts for Finance master degree. I love sports and music, enjoy writing travel journals related to cultures, philosophy and psychology. 

I like everything combining emotion & rationality (e.g. architecture, literature) Also obsessed with DIY, making myself wild and get inspiration from nature things.

I don’t welcome picky mean serious people.

column7: Modern Classic Ensuites Bristols for Students Only
column8: Experience the best of student living with our modern yet classic ensuite rooms in Bristol. Nestled in the heart of the city, our accommodations offer cozy retreats with all essentials. Join a vibrant student community, close to top universities and lively local spots. Choose comfort, convenience, and a thriving student life.
column9: You’ll never have to worry about showing your parents around the city when you study in Bristol. There are so many cultural hotspots! Take in the city’s heritage at Bristol Museum, stroll along the Harbour, visit animals from around the world at Bristol Zoo, or catch a play in the grand Old Vic.
column16:
Hi there!

We value every guest that stays at our properties, and we always make an effort to ensure that they have a memorable and enriching experience. We are looking forward to hosting you soon.
Ava and team

column8:
Close to some of the most beautiful green spaces in Bristol, this gem is also in walking distance of the popular Church Road and Greenbank area.

Despite how quiet it is, you can get into town within 20 minutes on the bus. This home is a perfect for a place for a family, or base for friends to explore Bristol.

column7: Eccentric & Quirky Three Bed  St George, Bristol
column8:
Situated in the heart of the community in St George, Bristol is this newly renovated three bedroom apartment. Its quirky decor seamlessly blend with modern design to create a well-balanced home.

This property is walking distance to independently owned shops and eateries, St George park and the Orchard Coffee & Co.

This lovely three bedroom apartment is the perfect place to stay in Bristol, although out of the centre it boasts free street parking and good transport links to Bristol & Bath.
column9:
Church road is home to Bristol's vibrant and diverse area. You can find an array of pubs, restaurants, homewear shops, handmade crafts and more all within walking distance of the property.

- St Georges park across the road
- TWO SIX FOUR - book and life style shop
- Cherry waves Vinly record shop
- L'amour living - life style shop
- Born in Bristol - gift shop
- The small city - bookshop
- Bristol Favours little trasures toy shop

column8: This stylish place to stay is The higgihaus @royalyorkcrescent and is the perfect for two or couples visiting the city for an event, a special occasion, or just looking for a comfortable and stylish apartment to get together and hang out.
column16:
At higgihaus we're on a mission to deliver the sort of accommodation we love to stay in when we're travelling - comfortable, convivial, achingly stylish and that somehow manages to capture that elusive 'it feels good, but I'm not sure why' feeling. 

Founded by Luke Spikes in 2017, higgihaus will be bringing its unique brand of 'place to stay' to urban locations across the United Kingdom. For now, we're focused on Bristol and Cardiff and would love for you to stay with us when you, your family, and friends visit these awesome cities.
